title: Content Item
description: A journal/magazine content item (article, advertisement, etc.)

uid.description: The unique identifier of the content item.

type.description: The type of the content item, as present in the OLR provided by the data provider. All content items are not characterised by the same set of types.

sourceMedium.description: Medium of the source (audio for audio radio broadcasts, print for newspapers, typescript for digitised radio bulletin typescripts).

title.description: The title of the content item.

locationEntities.description: Linked location entities mentioned in the content item.

personEntities.description: Linked person entities mentioned in the content item.

organisationEntities.description: Linked organisation entities mentioned in the content item.

newsAgenciesEntities.description: Linked news agency entities mentioned in the content item.

topics.description: Topics mentioned in the content item.

transcriptLength.description: The length of the transcript in characters.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages the item covers.

languageCode.description: ISO 639-1 language code of the content item.

isOnFrontPage.description: Whether the content item is on the front page of the publication.

publicationDate.description: The publication date of the content item.

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the content item.

providerCode.description: The code of the data provider.

mediaUid.description: Media title alias. Usually a 3 letter code of the media title (newspaper, radio station, etc.).

mediaType.description: The type of the media the content item belongs to.
